A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Completely breaks from anything remotely close to the saga until this point. Disjointed from even the previous movie. Honestly this felt more like someone making fun of Star Wars and it's fans than being interested in adding to the decades spanning story.\n\nI had seen every single Star Wars film in the theatre on opening week up to this one. It was and will be the last I spend money on.
